question: Which of the following gas was released during Bhopal gas tragedy?
explanation: On the night of 2â€“3 December, 1984, a poisonous gas, Methy Isocyanate leaked from Union Carbide India Limited plant in Bhopal. Over 500,000 people were exposed to this deadly gas. Methyl isocyanate is an organic compound with the molecular formula CH3NCO.
